titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for authorizing an uniformity of the Book of Common-Prayer, to be used throughout the realm.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our court, the 5th, day of March.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
